EmailTemplate.name: RE: Appt MBO Partners Information (1315337648.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Appt MBO Partners Information (1315337648.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Sue, It was a pleasure speaking with you. Ive enclosed a few things as summary to our call:  Link to our benefits: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits  Link to a summary of the value of using MBO Partners: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Welcome_to_MBO_Partners.pdf  Link to the most common types of non-billable expenses you can submit to us: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_List.pdf  Our Full Expense Policy: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf I've also enclosed the estimates we spoke about: - CA @ 50 - CA @ 60 - CA @ 75 I will follow up with you as a courtesy on Thursday, but feel free to email or call me should you have any questions, Regards, Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. Steve Sent from my iP
